x_axis.title: Use first column as x-axis
x_axis.description: When checked, the first data column will be used for the x-axis. Otherwise, all columns of the data are considered parallel y-axes, and the x-axis on the figure will be the index.

truncate.title: Truncate history points
truncate.description: When checked, will only keep up to a certain number of data points. Otherwise, will keep all history.

history_len.title: Maximum number of history points to keep
history_len.description: Only effective when truncate is on.
